issue.title: [CF 1470] Timer
issue.body:
TMW does not support OmniCC analog  - included in the ElvUi. The timer is simply not displayed. Is it possible to add support for ElvUi?


> Posted by CurseForge user mav_sdw | Imported from CurseForge issue #1470 | Raw

comments.body:
Did you enable the setting on the icon called "Show ElvUI timer text"?


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Where?


> Posted by CurseForge user mav_sdw

That's a meta icon. Meta icons don't have their own settings (for the most part) - they inherit the settings of the icons that they're composed of.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
